title: Commemorating the renaming of the field at RFA Stadium in recognition of Coach Tom Hoke
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  commemorating  the renaming of the field at RFA
Stadium in recognition of Coach Tom Hoke

WHEREAS, The quality and character of life in this Nation and the  great
State  of  New York is reflective of the purposeful lives and good works
of community members who  dedicated  their  lives  and  careers  to  the
service of others; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly  proud  to  commem-
orate  the  renaming of the field at RFA Stadium in recognition of Coach
Tom Hoke on Friday, October 8, 2010; and
  WHEREAS, Coach Tom Hoke served the  Rome  City  School  District  with
distinction  as  Head  Varsity  Football Coach for 26 years and physical
education teacher for more than 30 years; and
  WHEREAS, Coach Tom Hoke served as Head Football Coach from  1974-2000;
he  coached  the 1981 New York State Championship Team and at the end of
his career, he became the second winningest coach in Section III  histo-
ry; and
  WHEREAS, Coach Tom Hoke finished with a record of 210-41-4, along with
19 league titles and eight sectional championships; and
  WHEREAS,  Coach  Tom  Hoke has made a significant contribution to both
the school district and the community of Rome, New York; and
  WHEREAS, Numerous former players, students and graduates of  the  Rome
City  School  District  have gone on to   success and consider Coach Tom
Hoke to have been a critical  mentor,  coach  and  influence  throughout
their lives and into adulthood; and
  WHEREAS,  Tom  Hoke's passion for excellence helped make Friday nights
under the lights at RFA Stadium a lasting tradition of school spirit and
community pride; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
commemorate  the  renaming of the field at RFA Stadium in recognition of
Coach Tom Hoke; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Coach Tom Hoke.
